content:
Domain-Specific Requirements: Internet Printing

  • Multiple “channels” or classes of notifications

  • Grouping/patterns of events (“job done” vs. “page 3 done”)

  • Support for “large” numbers of clients

  • Multiple notification methods (email, programmatic, log files, etc.)

  • Eliminate redundancy—treat print requests as subscriptions
